metadata.synopsis: John Dillinger's (Lawrence Tierney) crime spree ends in 1934 when the lady in red (Anne Jeffreys) shows the FBI where he is.

reviews: A tough, tight, tense, tricky little melodrama.
A powerful, bleak B-level biopic of the legendary gangster made just a decade after his death.
This 70-minute classic from Monogram Studios is the epitome of what they call "lean and mean."
